CustomField.formula: IF( Services_Amount_Fixed_Fee__c == 0 && Services_Amount_T_M__c > 0, "Time and Materials", IF( Services_Amount_Fixed_Fee__c > 0 && Services_Amount_T_M__c == 0, "Fixed Price", IF( Services_Amount_Fixed_Fee__c > 0 && Services_Amount_T_M__c > 0, "Blended", "No Billing" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Billing Type
